title: Natural Voice Commands with Detailed Feedback
task: Interacts with ALFRED using natural voice commands
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to use natural voice commands and receive detailed, friendly explanations from ALFRED to learn its features and confidently use the system.

title: Friendly and Informal Voice Interaction
task: Prefers ALFRED to communicate in a friendly, informal tone
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to use friendly, informal language so I feel comfortable and eager to learn how to use it.

title: Control Sharing of Personal Health Data
task: Seeks to maintain autonomy and control over personal health data sharing
summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to share essential personal health data to enable personalized care, while respecting my privacy settings.

title: Spontaneous Social Chat to Reduce Loneliness
task: Uses ALFRED to stave off loneliness through social interaction features
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to optionally chat spontaneously with strangers to reduce loneliness and feel connected.

title: Gentle Morning Health Reminders
task: Wakes up responding to ALFRED's gentle voice reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to wake me up with clear, detailed voice reminders about my health habits, so I can learn and stay motivated without feeling rushed.

title: Morning Hydration Reminder with Explanation
task: Drinks a glass of water as prompted by ALFRED before starting the day
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to explain in detail why I should drink water in the morning and remind me so I stay motivated to improve my health.

title: Accept Virtual Group Activities
task: Chooses to accept social invitations to virtual group activities to reduce loneliness
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to join virtual group activities spontaneously to reduce loneliness and enjoy socializing on my own terms.

title: Learn and Adapt with Coaching
task: Feels empowered by learning and adapting alongside the system’s coaching
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to explain its coaching features clearly so I can learn how to use them and improve myself.

title: Continuous Health Monitoring for Reassurance
task: Relies on ALFRED’s continuous monitoring for reassurance about her wellbeing
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to continuously monitor health data and send notifications based on my preferences, so I stay informed without overload.

title: Support Independent Living with Mobility Issues
task: Embrace technology to support independent living despite mild mobility issues
summary: As an older adult interested in staying active, I want ALFRED to suggest challenging exercises proactively when I opt in, so that I stay motivated and healthy.

title: Personalized Health Support Apps
task: Seek apps that provide sophisticated and personalized health support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to download health apps that clearly explain their features, so I can confidently challenge myself with tailored exercises.

title: Adaptive Recommendations from Shared Health Data
task: Trust ALFRED to adapt recommendations based on shared health data
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to use my shared health data within allowed limits to provide personalized support for my well-being.
